name: Not You Mary Lu
description:
'Not You Mary Lu' is a side scroller game where you have to keep the chicken moving foward for the longest time possible, BUT everytime you use double jump, Mary Lu the chicken lays an egg of destiny that changes the conditions of the level randomically.

Try to control this silly chicken while the lights go off, the speed increases, the gravity gets upside down and many more!

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Lusco Fusco Game Studio: Bruno Anselmo, Camila Bothona, Felipe Hipólito, Gabriel Guedes, Marcelo Marques e Paula Guilherme

Follow us at facebook and instagram!!!
